awd_titl_txt: Optical Determination of the Full Stress Tensor in Sheared  Polymer Fluids
awd_abstract_narration: Under a Research Initiation Award, a novel birefringence                        technique will be explored for characterizing the properties                    of polymeric fluids. In particular, more accurate and reliable                                                                                                  measurements will be obtained for the full stress tensor,                       including the second normal stress difference. The technique                    will be applied to several phenomena in entangled linear                        polymer solutions, such as for example oscillatory shear.                       Polymeric fluids, and their characterization, play an                           important role in a very broad range of materials processing                    techniques. Optimal processing conditions would be predictable                                                                                                  with greater certainty with better materials characterization.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
